content: I've been really into neutral colors lately, like beige, gray, and navy. I think they're so versatile and easy to mix and match with other pieces. I've also been loving the bohemian vibe, with fringe, tassels, and flowy fabrics. But at the same time, I don't want to overdo it and look too trendy. I'm looking for something that's stylish but still classic and timeless.
